greeting.title: Olymp Spa
greeting.subtitle: empire of beauty
greeting.paragraph1: OLYMP is not just a spa center, but a true oasis of relaxation and self-care, located in the 'Moskovskie Vorota' hotel.
greeting.paragraph2: We offer a variety of care programs, including classic, sports, anti-cellulite massage, as well as the unique 'Sultan' ritual with four hands performed by true masters.
greeting.paragraph3: After your massage session, continue your wellness journey with a cedar barrel treatment. Hairdresser and brow services are also available to complete your transformation.
greeting.paragraph4: Feel the atmosphere of warmth, comfort, and peace at the OLYMP salon.

privacy.title: Personal Data Processing Policy
privacy.intro: This personal data processing policy has been prepared in accordance with the requirements of Federal Law No. 152-FZ dated July 27, 2006 'On Personal Data' and defines the procedure for processing personal data and measures to ensure the security of personal data taken by individual entrepreneur Nesterova Tatyana Eduardovna.
privacy.purpose: The purpose of this policy is to ensure the protection of human and civil rights and freedoms when processing their personal data.
privacy.applies: This policy applies to all information that the Operator may receive about visitors to the https://olympspa.ru website.
privacy.definitions_intro: Key terms used in the Policy:
privacy.definitionsText:
2.1. Automated processing – processing using computing equipment.
2.2. Blocking – temporary suspension of personal data processing.
2.3. Website – https://olympspa.ru and all its content.
2.4. Information system – databases and IT tools used to process data.
2.5. Anonymization – actions that make it impossible to identify the data subject.
2.6. Processing – any actions with personal data: collection, storage, transmission, etc.
2.7. Operator – the person who determines the purpose and scope of personal data processing.
2.8. Personal data – information related to a website user.
2.9. Publicly available data – data permitted by the subject for dissemination.
2.10. User – any visitor of the https://olympspa.ru website.
2.11. Provision – actions aimed at disclosing personal data.
2.12. Dissemination – disclosure of data to an unlimited number of persons.
2.13. Cross-border transfer – transfer of data outside the Russian Federation.
2.14. Destruction – actions leading to complete and irreversible loss of data.
privacy.operator_rights: The Operator has the right to:
privacy.operator_rights_text:
3.1. The Operator has the right to:
— Obtain reliable information from the data subject.
— Continue processing without consent if there are legal grounds.
— Independently determine necessary measures to comply with the law.
privacy.operator_duties_text:
3.2. The Operator must:
— Provide the data subject with information about their data.
— Organize data processing in accordance with Russian law.
— Respond to data subject requests.
— Inform the authorized authority upon request.
— Publish this Policy in open access.
— Take measures to protect data from unauthorized access.
— Cease processing and destroy data when necessary.
— Fulfill other obligations established by law.
privacy.agreeText: I have read and agree to the privacy policy.
